greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Second coordinate of fundamental unit of real quadratic field with discriminant A003658(n), n >= 2.
comment: See A014000 for much more about this sequence. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 14 2013
reference: H. Cohen, A Course in Computational Algebraic Number Theory, Springer, 1993, pp. 515-519.
link: Steven R. Finch, Class number theory [Cached copy, with permission of the author]
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = { for (n=2, nn, if (isfundamental(n), nc = core(n); m = Mod (nc, 4); if ((m == 2) || (m == 3), d = 1); if ((m == 1), d = 4); b = 1; a = 0; while (a == 0, v = nc*b^2; if (issquare(v-d), a = sqrtint(v-d), if (issquare(v+d), a = sqrtint(v+d))); if (a == 0, b++; );); print1(b, ", ");););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 25 2018
results.author: Eric Rains (rains(AT)caltech.edu)
